alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Jackson; Ritchie; Roane; Wirt; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, southwestern Ritchie, Wirt, northwestern Roane, northeastern Jackson and southeastern Wood Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sandyville, or 9 miles northeast of Ripley, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elizabeth, Sandyville, Reedy, Cherry, Peewee, Smithville, Walker, Petroleum, Palestine, Lucille, Freeport, Greencastle, Creston, Morristown, Brohard, Macfarlan, Leroy and Munday. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia near mile marker 145. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central, north central and northwestern West Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Jackson; Ritchie; Roane; Wirt; Wood
